code: import*as Data from"../../Data";import{productColorsStyle}from"../../settings";import{reactLocalStorage}from"reactjs-localstorage";export var getFeaturedProducts=function getFeaturedProducts(){var featuredProducts=[];featuredProducts=Data.allProducts.filter(function(product){return product.featured=="yes";});return featuredProducts;};export var getRecentlyViewed=function getRecentlyViewed(){var rViewedProducts=[];rViewedProducts=reactLocalStorage.getObject("recentlyViewed");if(rViewedProducts&&rViewedProducts.length>0){}else{rViewedProducts=[];}return rViewedProducts;};
